# Blindsight (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level: [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]]**, [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 32

*You touch your intended subject, which then turns its head rapidly about as if looking for the source of some sound.*

This spell grants the subject the blindsight ability effective out to 30 feet.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 3, Wizard 3 to Level per Savage Species.
